attributes.action: Instigate an inquiry into whether TV Licensing are pressurising people with valid concessionary licences to have a full price licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many tenants of sheltered housing were 
granted concessionary licences some 
years ago. Regulations a few years 
later made it clear that the tenant 
remained entitled to it even if other 
apartments in their block had a 
changed status and new tenants had to 
pay a full licence. It appears that 
TV Licensing are refusing to abide by 
this ruling and refuse even to 
recognise documentary evidence about 
a concessionary licence from its own 
office.
